feed.subtitle: Hyunjoon's blog where he writes about pretty much anything.

entry.title: Installing Linux
entry.summary: So searching for a new laptop took me about two weeks… I ended up getting a Thinkpad x1 gen 7. Okay. I thought I was ready to try Linux but I hadn’t decided what distro I was going to install. To be honest, I kind of knew there were different versions of Linux but didn’t know there were so many. Since the school lab machines use Ubuntu, I was thinking about installing Ubuntu. And just like w...

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.summary: Hello! Hi, this is Joon and I will be writing about some of the things that I do while studying at the University of Minnesota - Twin Cities. I will be starting my first year of Master’s program in computer science. I hope you enjoy your time here! Thanks for visiting, Joon
